articles.author: JJ Coughlan, Robert Byrne
articles.title: The lesser-known risk factors for heart disease - The Conversation Indonesia
articles.description: Gout, psoriasis, inflammatory bowel disease and rheumatoid arthritis are all risk factors for heart disease. They all have one thing in common: inflammation.
articles.content: Most people know that the risk factors for heart disease are high blood pressure, smoking, raised cholesterol and being overweight. However, many people who have a heart attack do not have any of the… [+6265 chars]

articles.title: Where And When To See The Five-Planet Alignment This Weekend - Forbes
articles.description: Saturn, Neptune, Jupiter, Uranus and Mercury will be aligned in the eastern pre-dawn sky this weekend. Here's exactly when and where to see the rare planetary alignment.
